There are a number tutorials available:

 

The important thing right now is to determine what your current skill level is, and make several practice runs, each time learning a new skill needed to get to the Mun and back:

1. Figure out how to launch and fly and rocket on a straight course

2. Figure out how to fly a rocket on a suborbital trajectory (i.e. leave the atmosphere and come back down shortly afterwards)

3. Figure out how to survive atmospheric re-entry

4. Figure out how to get your rocket to maintain a stable orbit around Kerbin, and then come back down safely

5. Figure out how to transfer your orbit from Kerbin to the Mun

6. Figure out how to land from Munar orbit to the surface of the Mun

7. Figure out how to take off from the Mun once again and reach Munar orbit

8. Figure out how to transfer your orbit from the Mun back to Kerbin, and then land back down on Kerbin safely

This might seem like a daunting list, but it's important for you to learn to solve problems by breaking them down into small, easy tasks.
